title: Corel Painter 2022 Education | Professional Digital Painting Software | Illustration, Concept, Photo & Fine Art [PC/Mac Key Card] [Old Version]
description: Enrich your art curriculum with an exceptional collection of renowned Natural-Media and ultramodern digital art materials in Painter 2022. Students can freely experiment with a virtually unlimited art supply. Thick paints, flowing watercolors, texture-exhibiting media types and photo art tools will bring a wide variety of classroom projects to life. Take advantage of the ability to create and exchange custom content to streamline projects. Plus, appreciate in-app learning, MacBook Pro Touch Bar support, and Photoshop compatibility. Enjoy the optimized speed, power and diversity of an art application trusted by educators and pro artists, all at an affordable price!
